May 17, 1902 D Ammanford Contest
Ammanford Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
ammanford-contest
None
Echoes of the Ocean
Ammanford, Carmarthenshire, Wales, UK Prizes - 1st £10, 2nd £5, 3rd £2, 4th £1. March contest - 1st(£1) Cwmtawe, 2nd (10s.) Trebanos. Best cornet, euphonium and trombone - Cwmtawe. 5 bands competed.
July 3, 2018, 9:45 p.m. July 3, 2018, 9:49 p.m.
1 Cwmtawe District Training Band Evan John Evans
2 Trebanos Public Thomas Hanney
3 Pontyberem United A. G. Harries
4 Emlyn Collieries George Dimmock
5 Brynamman Volunteers Theo Evans
